name: municipallabs.Legaside
body: deploying ai to triage legislative inboxes and surface signals. reduces manual tagging, exposes backlog risk, and gives leadership real-time context.

name: municipallabs.landing
body: crisp narrative around problem→mission→product. animation-heavy, but fast and accessible.

name: devmo.link
body: connects hackathon builders via interest vectors. end-to-end encrypted messaging and safe media pipeline.

name: fedramp.ai.compliance
body: questionnaire → system security plan drafts. turns weeks of docs into hours; opinionated, auditable outputs.

name: gmail.promote.whitman
body: my inbox became a data lake. deterministic keyword routing + time windows to surface only
